vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.9;
son of: Bela (H1106A);
brother of: Ard (H0714H), Naaman (H5283H), Ezbon (H0675H), Uzzi (H5813I), Uzziel (H5816I), Jerimoth (H3406), Iri (H5901), Addar (H0146H), Gera (H1617I), Abihud (H0031) and Abishua (H0050H); also called Ahoah at 1Ch.8.4;
Also named: a.cho.chi (אֲחוֹחִי "Ahohite" H0266)
§ Ahoah = "brother of rest"
a grandson of Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Bela; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞何亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "安息的兄弟"
一名便雅憫人 (代上 8:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚何亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "安息的兄弟"
一名便雅悯人 (代上 8:4)
